name: elintdv
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cint(c1)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c0, cv(s0)))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cint(c1)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c0, cv(s0)))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cint(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c0, cv(s0)))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

comment: Membership in class intersection. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Jan-2021.)
